sn35.149:4.3: katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, nibbānasappāyā paṭipadā?
sn35.149:4.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhuṃ anattāti passati, rūpā anattāti passati, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ anattāti passati, cakkhusamphasso anattāti passati, yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi anattāti passati … pe …
sn35.149:4.5: mano anattāti passati, dhammā anattāti passati, manoviññāṇaṃ anattāti passati, manosamphasso anattāti passati, yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi anattāti passati.
sn35.149:4.6: Ayaṃ kho sā, bhikkhave, nibbānasappāyā paṭipadā”ti.
